title: morning_dog_feeding_routine
summary: Morning feeding routine for dogs at MaMeeFarm.
description: This data unit documents the morning feeding activity for dogs at MaMeeFarm. A total of 20 dogs were fed during this routine, consisting of 9 adult dogs and 11 puppies. Feeding is conducted twice daily, in the morning and evening, as part of standard animal care practices.

reference_context.feeding_sequence: morning routine following previous evening feeding

external_reference.note: Timestamp visible on image; used as primary evidence.
